Quem jogou Portal 2 antes desse vai chegar ao fim rapidinho, esse é bem mais curtinho e os desafios são bem mais simples pra quem já conseguiu passar por aquelas fases doideiras do Portal 2 que deixava a gente pensando um tempão e se sentindo um gênio quando adivinhava tudo o que tinha que fazer. Satisfação garantida pra quem gosta de puzzles.
Игра очень классная. Большая часть уровней застовляет думать. Игра мне очень понравилась я с радостью прошел её два раза.

While I never really got the chance to play it back then, I saw both Portal 1 and 2 for sale just as I happen to get a $20 steam card, so, I decided to finally buy them and really check them out. Honestly, I'm loving Portal so far, even if I've really only just started.

So this game took me about 5-4 hours estimated, I honestly cannot tell you how much I enjoyed finally understanding what I needed to do. The big brain moments were amazing, and the credits were even better, I can't recommend it enough.

OMG that robot is so dang annoying!


great game, took about 4 hours. i played it in two long sessions and thouroughly enjoyed it and hated it at the same time. its kind of like flappy bird, u cant stop playing it, but you also want to smash youre computer with a sledge hammer. also the creddits were by far the best thing ive ever seen in my life.
muito bom

When I got the game, I was able to beat it in less than one day. Portal is a classic puzzle game with an interesting but not over-complicated story. The puzzles range from infuriatingly simple to painfully difficult. While it is a tad short, I loved every second of it. I'm not quite sure if this game is a must-buy at regular price, but on sale it is totally worth it!
buen juego, interesante y desafiente pero muy corto
Gran juego para pasar el rato libre.

You don't me to tell you that Portal is an absolute classic that deserves to be played.

Portal 2 is one of my all-time favorite games, and while it is both superior to the original and can stand alone, it is definitely worth playing the original as it serves as a great prequel and as it sets up a good bit of lore (and it is short at 2-3 hours). It does feel a tad dated at times, especially with the timing of the loading screens, but it still holds up quite well.

Do yourself a favor and experience one of the gaming's classics.
Such a great game, creative, fun and challenging, Love it!

This game is absolutely timeless. It starts off with a simple game mechanic that later intrigues you to follow a great story. Love the game. It be cool to see a third one though. Valve keep it up!

De los mejores juegos que jugue en mi vida. Se nota el cariño que le pusieron a este juego. Es uno de los juegos mas simples pero mejor desarrollados de la historia. Y tiene al personaje mas carismatico que vi en mi vida.
益智耐玩的小游戏，二代有联机和工坊。
Always an amazing play through

Legendary Portal game, as I'm sure most people know. I actually played Portal 2 before this, sadly. I got this part of the Orange Box on sale. It's a fairly short game, as it was just meant to be an extra short game to add to the Orange Box, but it's worth playing because the Portal games are so great. It takes place in the Half Life universe, so be sure to check those games out as well if you like singleplayer shooter games. Portal, however, is a first person puzzle game. You play as Chell, a test subject at Aperture Laboratories. Chell is forced to solve tests by the evil AI known as GLaDOS using her only weapon: the Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device, AKA the portal gun. Solve puzzles, or tests, as you uncover the story of Aperture Laboratories and GLaDOS from the cryptic deep lore and enjoy hidden Half Life references. Be sure to also check out Portal 2 to continue the story. Just don't expect a third game.
Коротковат сюжет, но все равно гуд.
Probably one pf the best puzzle games yet. Definitely recommend!

Éste es uno de mis juegos favoritos como la gran mayoría de juegos que produce Valve. Tiene una gran historia inolvidable llena de estrategia compuesta de maneras muy estratégicas. Narrativa muy bien hecha además de sus mecánicas, Easter Eggs y personajes que te obligan a seguir jugando hasta tener el 100% completado. Además de la historia principal, cuenta con dos modos de juego:
1.- Desafíos.
2.-  Cámaras avanzadas.
Que están entera y completamente llenos de frenétismo.
天马行空 在那个时代能玩到的人该有多幸运

A short and sweet classic.  can't believe it took me this long to play, but I could say that about a lot of games.
The game is paced very well, slowly increasing the difficulty and length of levels up until its pretty nice ending.
The only bad thing, I guess, was that I prefer game controllers over mouse and keyboard and did not realize how to turn that on until very late in the game (it's on the mouse sensitivity screen in the options menu).
Definitely enjoyed this game and I'm ready to try the sequel....  as soon as I get to it....  someday......
topzera

This game is like a rite of passage; a must-play for every gamer out there. It's hard to see anybody not liking Portal.

Though short if you know what you're doing - I finished the main game in less than 2 hours - it still holds up to this day, in both graphics and gameplay.

[h1]Πολύ καλό παιχνίδι![/h1] 
Ναι φυσικά και έχουν περάσει αρκετά χρόνια από τότε που βγήκε αλλά όμως μπορεί να σταθεί εύκολα απέναντι σε σημερινά puzzle games. Είναι μικρό σε διάρκεια αλλά αυτό σημαίνει ότι μπορεί να το απολαύσει ο οποιοσδήποτε ακόμα και αν δεν έχει αρκετό  χρόνο. Φυσικά και το προτείνω γιατί είναι ένα κλασικό πλέον παιχνίδι με ιδιαίτερους γρίφους και μια ενδιαφέρουσα ιστορία.
